text: A total of 457 individuals were screened for the study ( Figure 1 . )Of these , 338 were ineligible after screening and record review and 12 declined to participate .
Of 457 individuals screened , a total of 107 participants were enrolled , with 56 and 51 randomly assigned to DAART and SAT , respectively .
